### 1. Supabase
**Category**: Dev tools

**Why you like it better than alternatives:**
"Supabase gave us a complete backend in minutes instead of months. Real-time database, authentication, and secure storage all built-in. PostgreSQL means our data stays in our control, and the auto-generated APIs saved us countless hours. Perfect for solo developers who want enterprise infrastructure without the complexity."

---

### 2. Vite
**Category**: Dev tools

**Why you like it better than alternatives:**
"Vite's lightning-fast development server means we see changes instantly. No more waiting for buildsâ€”our workflow is smooth as butter. Production builds finish in seconds. Coming from Create React App, the speed improvement was night and day."

---

### 3. Tailwind CSS
**Category**: Design tools

**Why you like it better than alternatives:"
"Tailwind CSS let us build a beautiful, responsive UI without writing custom CSS. The utility-first approach means we design directly in components, and mobile optimization is effortless. Dark mode and accessibility built-inâ€”Balanze's modern interface wouldn't exist without it."

---

### 4. React (Optional)
**Category**: Dev tools

**Why you like it better than alternatives:**
"React's component architecture made building our complex financial dashboard intuitive. The mature ecosystem and excellent documentation helped us ship faster. For an app with interactive charts and real-time data, React keeps everything smooth and performant."

---

### 5. Capacitor (Optional - if launching mobile)
**Category**: Dev tools / Mobile

**Why you like it better than alternatives:**
"Capacitor turned our web app into a native Android app with zero code changes. One codebase, multiple platforms. Native plugins give us device features, and Google Play deployment was seamlessâ€”no need to learn Swift/Kotlin."

## âœ… Recommended Order:
1. Supabase (most impactful - backend is critical)
